## Convert Corpus's text to lower case:
```{sh}
tr  "[:upper:]" "[:lower:]"< Corpus_uniq.txt
```

## Remove punctuation symbols
```{sh}
tr "[:punct:]" " "< Corpus_uniq_lower.txt | sort -u
```
